name: BunkerEscape
description: This is the first 2D game project I have attempted since starting my course in game arts and design. The art work is not the best and is visibly something I need to improve upon but the game was a tonne of fun to make and I feel that the coding and interactions of the game works really well and all links in together. As a first project I understand I have a lot to work on and improve but I feel it went really well please give any additional feed back or possible improvements I myself may have not realised or noticed.
